statements: SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE treatment = 'Medication A';
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) FROM PatientMedicalRecords GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_id BETWEEN 1001 AND 1010;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_patients FROM PatientMedicalRecords GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM PatientMedicalRecords ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis IN ('Flu', 'Cold');
SELECT patient_name, MAX(patient_id) FROM PatientMedicalRecords GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 50
SELECT id, name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age < 30
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 50
SELECT id, name FROM patients ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT AVG(age) FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT MIN(age) FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever'
SELECT id, name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND diagnosis = 'Cough'
SELECT id, name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age < 50 OR gender = 'Female'
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE diagnosis IN ('Fever', 'Cough')
SELECT id, name, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' OR diagnosis = 'Flu'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id
SELECT appointment_date, department FROM appointments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, doctor_name FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE age > 40
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_name, department FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) FROM medical_records GROUP BY doctor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialization FROM doctors
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, time_slot FROM appointments
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, status FROM appointments
SELECT medication_id, patient_id, medication_name FROM medications
SELECT patient_id, dosage, frequency FROM medications
